subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Serge Ibaka tied his career-best with 25 points and grabbed a season-high 17 rebounds, and Oklahoma City (20-4) beat the San Antonio Spurs, 107-93.
snippet: Serge Ibaka tied his career-best with 25 points and grabbed a season-high 17 rebounds, and Oklahoma City (20-4) beat the San Antonio Spurs, 107-93.
